title: Bug 2940 - Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA)
description: In the export zip feature, the updating of checkboxes should display a busy cursor to indicate that the process is ongoing.
OB: When performing the export zip operation in a workspace with many projects, the checkboxes are updated without any indication of the ongoing process.
EB: When performing the export zip operation, the checkboxes should display a busy cursor to indicate that the updating process is ongoing.
SR:
To reproduce this issue: 
1. Open a workspace with many projects.
2. Go to the export zip feature.
3. Select all projects.
4. Choose some file types.
5. Press OK.
